commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: Lundell with a shot on net! Skinner makes the save, but the Panthers are relentless on the attack.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: Edmonton needs to find an answer, and quickly. Florida is dictating the pace of play, and Skinner is being tested early and often.
